thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: DIARY - Today in Washington - Jan 9

author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY - Today in Washington - Jan 9

organizations.name: american petroleum institute issues weekly national petroleum

text:
ALL TIMES IN EST/GMT 0600/1100: The National Federation of Independent Business issues Small Business Optimism Index for December.
1130/1630: The Labor Dept. issues Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey for November.
1130/1630: The Treasury Dept. holds weekly sale of 4-week bills.
1300/1800: The Treasury Dept. sells 3-year notes.
1630/2130: The American Petroleum Institute issues weekly national petroleum report.
